name: Boombox!
description:
Hey! We made a game about defusing a bomb again.

This time we’ll have you click the fuse to put it out! The trick? The bomb is inside a box or two, you’ll need to take it out first.

Good luck!

We have features:

  1. A couple dozen tricky boxes to open
  2. Some puzzling and some reflexing to do
  3. Crazy rotations
  4. One bomb about to blow

And simple controls!

  1. WASD to rotate the box
  2. Click to use the key
